text: This is a very experimental, real India-China conversation.
You grew up in China?
Yes.
When the one-child policy was there in China,
are you part of that one-child policy?
I am.
A lot of people say, oh, your government is mim.
Why have one-child policy?
People should have freedom.
I disagree about that.
How do I make it reach Chinese audiences?
TikTok.
But in China is the same platform we call Doin.
If you want to really to see China media, that is a trick I just found it out.
I will be definitely banned.

Are Chinese people romantic?
I think in general, no?
No.
Yeah.
Chinese people are super shy.
More think about the business, family and make money, make money and make money.
A lot of Indians.
We're very curious about China. We want to learn from China.
But many of us are vegetarian. We don't eat meat.
Ah, don't worry. You need to go to the restaurant to mention your vegetarian.
When I was child, I was a vegetarian.
Really? I burned like that.
President Xi Jinping, how does he talk to public?
He's quite cool guy.
He's always going to different side of China be down to the factory, to the people's family, even to the village, to show the government's cares.
Let's speak about Bollywood. What we are told is that Amir Khan is very big in China.
You know who is more famous right now in China?
It's the billionaire.
Anandamani.
He's got so famous in China.
Everyone talk about him.
Honestly, there's a lot of geopolitical tension between our two countries.
Two, three years ago, there was a clash at the border with Chinese soldiers and Indian soldiers.
In India, we are told that after India, China war, one part of India got taken away.
Aksai Chin.
To be honest, media will never know the truth.
You will never know the truth.
This was announced in China?
Yeah, yeah, yeah, for sure.
What was said?
I'm quite the international open mind, but I'm really disagree about this part.
It's because they don't know what's happened in the moment in China.
How does China feel about religion in general?
We don't have a religion, but mainly people believe Buddhates.

She are promoting for me Indian religion.
She teaches me.
Hinduism?
Krishna.
Wow.
